```starlark

    name = "com_adobe_rules_gitops",

    strip_prefix = "rules_gitops-0.22.0",

)

    name = "io_bazel_rules_go",
    sha256 = "099a9fb96a376ccbbb7d291ed4ecbdfd42f6bc822ab77ae6f1b5cb9e914e94fa",
    urls = [
        "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/bazelbuild/rules_go/releases/download/v0.35.0/rules_go-v0.35.0.zip",
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_go/releases/download/v0.35.0/rules_go-v0.35.0.zip",
    ],
)

load("@io_bazel_rules_go//go:deps.bzl", "go_register_toolchains", "go_rules_dependencies")

go_rules_dependencies()

go_register_toolchains(version = "1.19.2")

load("@com_adobe_rules_gitops//gitops:deps.bzl", "rules_gitops_dependencies")

rules_gitops_dependencies()

load("@com_adobe_rules_gitops//gitops:repositories.bzl", "rules_gitops_repositories")

rules_gitops_repositories()

```


## What's Changed
* Add support for incremental stamping by @randrei-adobe in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/175

## New Contributors
* @randrei-adobe made their first contribution in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/175

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/compare/v0.21.0...v0.22.0

## What's Changed
* use lightweight git clone by @kzadorozhny in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/179
* use lightweight checkout  by @kzadorozhny in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/180


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/compare/v0.19.0...v0.21.0

## What's Changed
* dont skip filtering on static namespace tests by @michaelschiff in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/143
* resolver: Don't crash on nil objs by @DolceTriade in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/142
* Add support of bazel tags to rules_gitops by @bhmiller in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/148
* Changes to prer to allow setting prTitle and prBody did not correctly preserve prior behavior for users who do not set these new arguments by @michaelschiff in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/149
* enable stamping if common_labels or common_annotations contains "{" marker by @michaelschiff in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/150
* chore: Configure Renovate by @renovate in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/151
* fix(deps): update module github.com/golang/protobuf to v1.5.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/152
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/153
* Upgrade minor Bazel versions in CI by @kzadorozhny in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/159
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.36.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/155
* chore(deps): update actions/cache action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/165
* chore(deps): update dependency com_github_bazelbuild_buildtools to v6.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/157
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/156
* handle image push errors by @kzadorozhny in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/178
* Add support for running Kustomize on Linux ARM64 by @ysinjab in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/176

## New Contributors
* @DolceTriade made their first contribution in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/142
* @bhmiller made their first contribution in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/148
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/151
* @ysinjab made their first contribution in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/176

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/compare/v0.18.0...v0.19.0

## What's Changed
* Handle case where returned object from a Watch is not a Pod by @harjsing7 in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/132
* Allow to set pull request custom title and body by @eko in https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/pull/137

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/adobe/rules_gitops/compare/v0.17.2...v0.18.0
